com.compositesw.common.security

Class CompositeSecurityException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.compositesw.common.CompositeException
          • com.compositesw.common.security.CompositeSecurityException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CompositeSecurityException
extends CompositeException
    CompositeSecurityException is responsible for organizing all security related exceptions for Composite.
    Author:
    sahuero
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
